name: The Light City of Karola
description:
Originally created in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 39.
Theme was Running Out of Power

This is a short game with only 8 levels. Enjoy it!

KEYBOARD:

  • Arrow Keys -> Movement
  • Z -> Jump
  • F -> Toggle Fullscreen
  • ESC -> Exit

Code: David Collado   Art: Fran Tovar

Music by Eric Skiff (Free Music Archive)
